#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define min 1001
ll a[101];
ll b[101];
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,k;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(k=1;k<=t;k++)
    {

        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                scanf("%lld",&b[i]);
            }
        sort(a,a+n);
        sort(b,b+n);
        ll dif,ans=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            int dif=a[i]-b[i];
            if(dif>0)
                ans=ans+dif;
            else
                ans=ans+(-dif);
        }


            printf("Case %d: %d\n",k,ans);

    }

}
